text:
Hey... Producer-san!
Was lunch something with ketchup...?

Oh, umm...
It was spaghetti Napolitan...
Oh no... please look in the mirror~!
Uh, is it all clean now?

It's not...
that helpful to be attended to with that expression...

...! Eh!
Wait, that's not it at all...

Please, just look in the mirror properly!
I absolutely won't help, so please fix it yourself!
Rather than apologizing, please just be more careful-

And, uh,
I'll ask for reimbursement for the tissue later-
